Class Student

java.lang.Object
User
Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a Student user in the Internship Placement Management System.

Students are a core user type in the system with the following capabilities:

  • Browse and filter internship opportunities based on profile
  • Apply for up to 3 internships simultaneously
  • View application status (Pending, Successful, Unsuccessful)
  • Accept placement confirmations from approved applications
  • Request withdrawals (pre and post confirmation)

Business Rules:

  • Year 1-2 students: Can only apply to BASIC level internships
  • Year 3-4 students: Can apply to any level (BASIC, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED)
  • Maximum 3 active applications at any time (PENDING or ACCEPTED status)
  • Can only accept ONE placement confirmation (auto-withdraws other applications)
  • Cannot apply to same internship twice
  • Only sees internships matching preferred major (if specified)

This class maintains a list of applications and enforces all student-specific validation rules through the addApplication method.

Version:
1.0
